question:
[Darren] likes to visit his sister. Her name is [Nichole]. [Darren] took his Aunt [Ruth] out for her favorite meal [Stephanie] and her brother [Jeff] wanted to go out and play, but [Stephanie]'s mom, [Ruth], told them they had to stay in and do their chores. [Evelyn] asked her daughter, [Nichole], if she would like to go to a movie with her on Saturday night.
Question: How is [Jeff] related to [Evelyn]?
